features.title: Why work with me?
features.subtitle: I bring a balance of technical depth, product sense, and visual craftsmanship.

performance.title: High performance
performance.description: I obsess over shipping fast, smooth experiences with thoughtful optimizations.

design.title: Delightful design
design.description: Modern, responsive interfaces crafted for clarity and consistency.

quality.title: Quality code
quality.description: Scalable, maintainable codebases built with clean architecture and testing.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: A quick snapshot of my journey, values, and capabilities.
about.unableToFetch: Unable to fetch data from GitHub. Falling back to sample data.
about.description: I love experimenting with new technologies and bringing them into production when they make sense. My goal is to build experiences that feel beautiful, purposeful, and genuinely useful for people.

timeline.title: Career milestones
timeline.subtitle: From the first lines of C to full-stack product builds and a DevOps-focused future.

phase1.label: Phase 1
phase1.title: Starting with C
phase1.description: Learned low-level thinking with C, data structures, and algorithms—building the mental model for everything after.

phase2.label: Phase 2
phase2.title: Java JSP/Servlet
phase2.description: Built dynamic applications with Java, JSP, and Servlets, understanding MVC patterns inside the Java EE ecosystem.

phase3.label: Phase 3
phase3.title: C# / .NET
phase3.description: Dived deep into C#/.NET for enterprise apps, from ASP.NET to service-oriented and microservice architectures.

phase4.label: Phase 4
phase4.title: React
phase4.description: Switched to modern frontend with React—building SPAs with hooks, context, and a rich ecosystem of tooling.

phase5.label: Phase 5
phase5.title: Node.js
phase5.description: Completed the stack with Node.js, building REST APIs, real-time services, and integrations with MongoDB/PostgreSQL.

phase6.label: Next
phase6.title: DevOps Engineer
phase6.description: Current focus: leveling up in DevOps—CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, cloud infrastructure, monitoring, and automation.

projects.title: Selected work
projects.subtitle: A mix of personal experiments and production projects built with care.
